<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Frost Vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 545 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Frost Vial (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 545 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d6 cold damage and 1 cold splash damage, and the target takes a –5-foot penalty.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Frost Vial (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 545 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 2d6 cold damage and 2 cold splash damage, and the target takes a –10-foot penalty.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Frost Vial (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 545 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 3d6 cold damage and 3 cold splash damage, and the target takes a –10-foot penalty.

level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Frost Vial (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 545 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 4d6 cold damage and 4 cold splash damage, and the target takes a –15-foot penalty.
